Module comp3111.examsystem
Package comp3111.examsystem.datastore

Class QuizDetail

java.lang.Object
comp3111.examsystem.datastore.BaseDatabaseHandler
comp3111.examsystem.datastore.QuizDetail
public class QuizDetail extends BaseDatabaseHandler
Singleton class for managing quiz details and operations Handles quiz creation, modification, and retrieval from JSON storage

    • addQuiz

      public Integer addQuiz(String[] params)
      Adds a new quiz to the system
      Parameters:
      params - Array containing quiz parameters: [0] - exam name [1] - exam time [2] - course ID [3] - publish status ("yes"/"no")
      Returns:
      Status code: 0 - Success -1 - File write error -2 - Quiz already exists

    • getQuestions

      public List<Question> getQuestions(String courseID, String quizID)
      Gets all questions for a specific quiz
      Parameters:
      courseID - ID of the course
      quizID - ID of the quiz
      Returns:
      List of Question objects, empty if none found

    • removeQuestionFromQuiz

      public int removeQuestionFromQuiz(String quizID, String courseID, String qid)
      Removes a question from a quiz
      Parameters:
      quizID - ID of the quiz
      courseID - ID of the course
      qid - ID of the question to remove
      Returns:
      Status code: 0 - Success -1 - File write error -2 - Quiz not found -3 - File read error

    • addQuestionFromQuiz

      public int addQuestionFromQuiz(String quizID, String courseID, String qid)
      Adds a question to a quiz
      Parameters:
      quizID - ID of the quiz
      courseID - ID of the course
      qid - ID of the question to add
      Returns:
      Status code: 0 - Success -1 - File write error -2 - Quiz not found -3 - File read error -4 - Question already exists in quiz

    • getQuizTime

      public int getQuizTime(String courseID, String quizID)
      Gets the time limit for a quiz
      Parameters:
      courseID - ID of the course
      quizID - ID of the quiz
      Returns:
      Time limit in minutes, 0 if not found

    • getQuizScore

      public int getQuizScore(String courseID, String quizID)
      Calculates the total score for a quiz
      Parameters:
      courseID - ID of the course
      quizID - ID of the quiz
      Returns:
      Total possible score for the quiz

    • deleteQuiz

      public int deleteQuiz(String quizID, String courseID)
      Deletes a quiz from the system
      Parameters:
      quizID - ID of the quiz to delete
      courseID - ID of the course containing the quiz
      Returns:
      Status code: 0 - Success -1 - File write error -2 - Quiz not found -3 - File read error -4 - Quiz cannot be deleted (students have already taken it)
